Instruction: In a medium bowl, beat together the eggs, cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger, and cloves.

Melt approximately 1 tablespoon of butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Dip each slice of bread individually into the egg mixture, ensuring both sides are quickly coated without soaking the bread completely.

Fry several slices at a time in the buttered skillet until each side is golden brown. Add additional butter to the skillet and proceed with the leftover slices. Melt the remaining butter in the microwave in 15-second intervals. Transfer the completed toast to plates, drizzle with melted butter, and sprinkle with confectioners' sugar.
